snippet: Syrians who rely on state television for their news missed harsh words about the conduct of forces loyal to President Bashar al-Assad.

byline.contributor: Reporting was contributed by Maher Samaan in Beirut.

lead_paragraph: Syrians who rely on state television for their news missed harsh words about the conduct of forces loyal to President Bashar al-Assad.

headline.print_headline: Syrian State TV Edits Out Criticism From Visiting U.N. Official
headline.main: Syrian State TV Edits Out Criticism From Visiting U.N. Official
